basic.description: Religion in modernity; traditional groups, newer religious movements, contemporary ideologies and social trends of religious significance.
basic.subject: RELS
basic.title: The Contemporary Religious Situation

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    Level 3 or 4 and registration in a RELS Major or Medial Plan.
Corequisite    RELS353 or (RELS354 and RELS355).
Exclusion    No more than 1 course from RELS451; RELS452.
